## FoundationLayoutItem.title property

Sets the title of the item which is displayed on the tab.

**Signature:**

```typescript
title: string;
```

## Remarks

Defaults to `Item ` + [FoundationLayoutItem.registration](./foundation-layout.foundationlayoutitem.registration.md)
